core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Soft Utility.
Emotion First: Structure = Trust. Clarity = Calm.
Content is King: Data density without clutter.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle borders for structure.

grid_system.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 transition-transform hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-6 border-2 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-800 transition-colors

cards.dashboard_widget: rounded-xl border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200
cards.neumorphic: rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 shadow-[0_4px_20px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)] border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 bg-transparent px-4 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all

navigation.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-card h-full flex flex-col
navigation.header: h-16 border-b border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl sticky top-0 z-50

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans' font families.
3. USE SHADCN: Use the existing components in /components/ui but STYLE them with the classes defined in 'components' section above.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'dashboard_shell' structure for all protected routes.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links (e.g., data-testid='login-submit').
7. THEME: Implement the light/dark mode toggle using a ThemeProvider.
8. PERMISSIONS: Ensure UI elements are conditionally rendered based on user role (Admin/Formador/User).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle noise.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all body text.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
